data.actual_result: After you delete the message, you're still able to type in the editing box as it doesn't go away. Sending it has no effect on anything.
data.expected_result: After deleting the message you were editing, the editing type-box should close itself
data.short_description: You're able to continue editing messages that you've just deleted
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message.  - Start to edit it.  - Delete the message without exiting the editing.
